description: Contains items related to having orders with relative start times in a treatment day.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: REL_START_TIME
columns.description: The reference date and time for the treatment day.  All of the orders in the day with relative start times are relative to this time.

columns.name: REL_ST_CHG_USER_ID
columns.description: This unique ID of the user who changed the reference time of the treatment day.

columns.name: REL_ST_CHG_DTTM
columns.description: This is the date and time that the reference time of the treatment day was changed

columns.name: REL_ST_CHG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason category ID for the reason that the reference time of the treatment day was changed. Link to ZC_OVRD_REASON__OVRD_REASON_C to get the value.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
